author: Author

generateInviteCodeTextAdmin: To invite a neighborhood, create an invitation code that you can send to other users. This code gives you access to the resources and features of the neighborhood.
inviteModalText: To join a neighborhood, enter the invitation code that was sent to you by another user. This code gives you access to the resources and features of the neighborhood.
maxRepaymentPeriod: Maximum repayment period is two years
neighborhoodDeleteText: If you are sure that you want to remove the neighborhood "{{ value }}", enter its name in the field below.

newDebtAmountError: The debt amount cannot become lower than the amount paid earlier
newPlanAmountSmallerError: The new collection amount is less than what has already been collected
noDebtsBannerText: Ouch! Looks like you haven't had any debts or debtors yet!
noDebtsOrDebtorsInNeighborhoodText: You don't have any debts or debtors in this neighborhood at the moment. However, you can create a new debt using the button below.
noDebtsOrDebtorsText: You don't have any debts or debtors at the moment. However, you can create a new debt using the button below.
noPlansBannerText: Oops! No shared plans with neighbors yet
noPlansText: You don't have any shared plans with your neighbors yet, but you can create them now. Plans are a great way to collaborate on ideas, whether it's organizing a neighborhood party, assisting with tasks, or even planning group shopping.
notEnoughPeopleInNeighborhood: There are not enough people in this neighborhood
registerBannerText: Neighbors - your apartment assistant for living together!
registerTextDebts: Calculate and track shared expenses and debts
registerTextTasks: Set schedules for cleaning, repairs, and other duties.
sendInviteCodeText: To invite a neighborhood, copy and send the invitation code to another user. This code gives users access to the resources and features of that neighborhood.
smallerPaymentError: The new payment amount exceeds your total amount. Please enter a smaller amount
zeroNeighborhoodsBannerText: You are not yet in any of the neighborhoods. Neighborhoods are a place where you can discuss common interests, share information, and interact with other members. Join an existing neighborhood or create your own!
zeroNeighborhoodsBannerTitle: Oops! Looks like you don't have any active neighborhoods yet.
